para.text: After July 17, 2017, no registrations, including renewals, shall be issued under Chapter 15C of this title.

A registration, including a renewal, issued before July 17, 2017, pursuant to Chapter 15C of this title, shall remain valid for one year from the date of registration, or renewal, or until December 31, 2018, whichever is first.

A person or entity who has a registration, including a renewal, that was issued before July 17, 2017, pursuant to Chapter 15C of this title, may continue to operate a PDD in accordance with Chapter 15C of this title, until the registration, or renewal, expires, is revoked, or the person or entity obtains a new permit under this chapter.
As of December 31, 2018, Chapter 15C of this title, is repealed.
para.codify:annotation: Section 7(c) of Law 22-137 repealed this chapter effective December 31, 2018.
